statements: SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory;
SELECT plant_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceHistory ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_description, plant_id FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' AND plant_id = 101;
SELECT DISTINCT plant_id FROM MaintenanceHistory ORDER BY plant_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE equipment_id = 123 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT plant_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE plant_id = 456 AND maintenance_type = 'Preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE equipment_id in (789, 890) AND maintenance_type = 'Corrective' ORDER BY equipment_id, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY equipment_id ASC, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT plant_id FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY plant_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_power_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM geothermal_power_plants ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location FROM geothermal_power_plants WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_type = 'Pump' ORDER BY last_service_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_service_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE service_provider = 'Maintenance Co. A';
SELECT * FROM geothermal_power_plants ORDER BY location DESC, last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT plant_name, location FROM geothermal_power_plants WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location, last_maintenance_date FROM geothermal_power_plants WHERE location = 'California' OR location = 'Nevada'
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE last_service_date < '2022-01-01' AND equipment_type = 'Geothermal Pump'
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, last_service_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE service_provider LIKE '%Geothermal%' ORDER BY last_service_date DESC
SELECT * FROM geothermal_power_plant;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM geothermal_power_plant WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_period > 6;
SELECT plant_name, location, commission_date FROM geothermal_power_plant ORDER BY commission_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM geothermal_power_plant INNER JOIN maintenance_history ON geothermal_power_plant.plant_id = maintenance_history.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_power_plant;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM geothermal_power_plant WHERE location='California';
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date FROM equipment ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, commission_date FROM geothermal_power_plant WHERE commission_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT plant_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM PlantMaintenances;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM EquipmentMaintenances;
SELECT plant_id, equipment_id, installation_date FROM PlantEquipment;
SELECT log_id, plant_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_name, labor_hours FROM MaintenanceLogs;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlantMaintenances ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM EquipmentMaintenances WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT plant_id, COUNT(equipment_id) AS num_equipment FROM PlantEquipment GROUP BY plant_id HAVING num_equipment > 2;
SELECT plant_id, equipment_id, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE labor_hours > 5 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM geothermal_plants WHERE commission_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT equip_name, purchase_date FROM equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT personnel_id, name, role FROM maintenance_personnel WHERE role = 'Engineer';
SELECT task_id, task_description, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE next_due < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM geothermal_plants ORDER BY plant_name ASC, commission_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT plant_name, location, commission_date FROM geothermal_plants WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT plant_name, commission_date, location FROM geothermal_plants WHERE commission_date <= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE condition = 'Good' AND purchase_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT personnel_id, name, role, contact_number FROM maintenance_personnel
